Hello Everybody,

i have succesfully created my code to fill a pre-designed Template(xlsx) with data. Im loading the template with PHPExcel_IOFactory::load, but the tesareas/texfields are not loaded into the object.

I have tested it also with *.xls files but the texfields/textareas are lost.

Does anybody have hint to get this working?

 

 

Thanks in advance!
Form features are not supported by PHPExcel.... and it's well down the "to do" list
